Package com.gcu.controller

Class HomeController

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.controller.HomeController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/") public class HomeController extends Object
Handles requests related to the home page, sign-up, login, and user sign-in.

    • doCreatePost

      @PostMapping("/doCreatePost") public String doCreatePost(@Valid @Valid PostModel postModel, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Processes the creation of a new post.
      Parameters:
      postModel - the post model containing the new post's data
      bindingResult - the binding result for validation errors
      model - the model to be populated with attributes
      Returns:
      the view template to redirect to, either the createPost template if there are errors or the home page

    • doUpdatePost

      @PostMapping("/post/update/doUpdate/{id}") public String doUpdatePost(@PathVariable int id, @Valid @Valid PostModel postModel, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Performs the update operation for a post.
      Parameters:
      id - grabbing from the url path
      postModel - The updated post model.
      bindingResult - The result of the validation.
      model - The model to which attributes will be updated.
      Returns:
      Redirects to the home page after updating the post.
